Meandros Ventures.description: Meandros Ventures is a new venture capital firm focusing on seed-stage investments in European technology companies.  They are likely to concentrate on high-growth potential startups within the SaaS and Fintech sectors.

Sola View Investments I - Med Tech.description: Sola View Investments I - Med Tech is a new investment firm focusing on the Med Tech industry.  They are currently in the pre-seed stage and are expected to make investments in innovative medical technology companies.

Stardust Ventures.description: Stardust Ventures is a new seed-stage venture capital firm focusing on early-stage investments in Indian startups across various sectors, including technology, healthcare, and consumer goods.

Model Ventures.description: Model Ventures is a seed-stage venture capital firm focusing on early-stage investments in technology companies.  They are known for their expertise in identifying promising startups with high-growth potential across various sectors.
